class.name: OpenXRAndroidEyeTrackingExtensionWrapper
class.description: Wraps the [code]XR_ANDROID_eye_tracking[/code] extension. This class is not meant to be used directly. Instantiate a [XRController3D] with [code]"/user/eye_tracker_android/left"[/code] to track left eye or [code]"/user/eye_tracker_android/right"[/code] to track right eye. Blink state is exposed as a input button named [code]"blink"[/code]. On eyelid close, the button indicates pressed and on eyelid open, the button indicates released. Fine eye tracking information is not supported.
